item.description: **Università della Svizzera Italiana (USI)** **Visiting Researcher** USI Software Institute -- ICSE 2024 Program Committee Member – Demonstrations Track 46th IEEE/ACM International Conference on Software Engineering SCAM 2023 Program Co-Chair – New Ideas and Emerging Results Track 23rd IEEE International Working Conference on Source Code Analysis and Manipulation CyberChallenge.IT 2023 Local Organizer and Instructor 6th Edition of the Italian Training Program in Cybersecurity ECAI 2023 Program Committee Member 26th European Conference on Artificial Intelligence
